result.purpose: Contains middleware components for handling HTTP requests, error management, authentication, and metrics tracking in a web application.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, where each file represents a specific middleware functionality that can be independently used and composed within the web application.

middleware/custom_requests_total_prometh.purpose: Defines middleware for tracking custom HTTP request metrics with Prometheus.

middleware/error_handler.go.purpose: Handles global error responses for an Echo web server.

middleware/internal_auth.go.purpose: Implements HMAC authentication middleware for validating request signatures.

middleware/network_api_v1_checking.go.purpose: Middleware to check if the API version is v1 and set a context key accordingly.

middleware/tracking_internal_api.go.purpose: Defines middleware for tracking API requests in an Echo web framework.

middleware/user_agent_parsing.go.purpose: Middleware for parsing user agent strings in an Echo web framework application.

middleware/wallet_auth.go.purpose: Middleware for verifying wallet signatures in HTTP requests.
